host.description: Mqtt broker hostname or IP address
host.title: Host

username.description: Username to connect ot mqtt broker
username.title: Username

port.description: Port to connect to mqtt broker
port.title: Port

topic_prefix.description: Prefix topic for boneIO to use. If not set, then it will be set to name of the device from boneio section, otherwise set to boneIO.
topic_prefix.title: Topic prefix

mqtt.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/mqtt 
 Mqtt section of boneIO Black configuration file. It handled connecting to mqtt broker, which then is connected to Home Assistant or other smart home system.
mqtt.title: Mqtt

username.description: Username to connect to web interface
username.title: Username

web.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/0.9.x-dev/configuration/web 
 Web section of boneIO Black. It enables web interface. Default on port 8090.
web.title: Web

default.description: Module which you want logger to set. Default for app logger.
default.title: Default

logger.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/logger 
 Logger section of boneIO Black. It enables logging level. If run as systemd service, then it will log to journal. If not, then it will log to /tmp/boneio.log
logger.title: Logger

modbus_id.description: Only needed if sensor type is modbus.
modbus_id.title: Modbus id

screensaver_timeout.description: How many seconds to wait to enable screensaver. 0 means disable screensaver.
screensaver_timeout.title: Screensaver timeout

oled.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/oled 
 Oled section of boneIO Black. It enables oled screen. You'd need enabled: true to make it work.
oled.title: Oled

modbus.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/modbus 
 Modbus section of boneIO Black. It enables modbus support. You define on which uart it modbus defined. For new boneIO it is uart4. For old boneIO it is uart1.
modbus.title: Modbus

address.description: Address of Modbus sensor to use.
address.title: Address

temperature.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
temperature.title: Temperature

humidity.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
humidity.title: Humidity

sensors_filters.description: List of sub sensors to use to filter. Available values are temperature or humidity.
sensors_filters.title: Sensors filters

width.description: Width of sensor in meters, cm etc. Without unit is meters
width.title: Width

length.description: Length of sensor in meters, cm etc. Without unit is meters
length.title: Length

data.description: Data to pass to additional sensors.
data.title: Data

modbus_devices.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/modbus-sensors 
 List of modbus sensors. You can use predefined modbus sensors. It would fetch data from them and publish to mqtt.
modbus_devices.title: Modbus devices

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

update_interval.description: Update interval. How often to fetch data from sensor. Default to 60s.
update_interval.title: Update interval

filters.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
filters.title: Filters

lm75.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/lm75 
 LM75 Sensor list. All boneIO Black has one LM75 on board.
lm75.title: Lm75

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

filters.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
filters.title: Filters

update_interval.description: Update interval. How often to fetch data from sensor. Default to 60s.
update_interval.title: Update interval

ina219.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/ina219 
 INA219 Sensor list. All boneIO Black has one INA219 on board, which measures current, voltage and power of boneIO board.
ina219.title: Ina219

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

update_interval.description: Update interval. How often to fetch data from sensor. Default to 60s.
update_interval.title: Update interval

filters.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
filters.title: Filters

mcp9808.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/mcp9808 
 MCP9808 Sensor list. Older boneIO Black had one MCP9808 instead of LM75on board, which measures temperature.
mcp9808.title: Mcp9808

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

init_sleep.description: How long to sleep for MCP to initialize.
init_sleep.title: Init sleep

mcp23017.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/mcp23017 
 MCP23017 Pin config. All boneIO Black 32X10/Cover/Cover Mix/24x16 has two MCP23017 on board. If you use new boneio: section, then you don't need to define this.
mcp23017.title: Mcp23017

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

init_sleep.description: How long to sleep for PCF to initialize.
init_sleep.title: Init sleep

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

init_sleep.description: How long to sleep for PCA to initialize.
init_sleep.title: Init sleep

momentary_turn_on.description: How long can this relay be off. Can"t be used if output_type is "none".
momentary_turn_on.title: Momentary turn on

momentary_turn_off.description: How long can this relay be on. Can"t be used if output_type is "none".
momentary_turn_off.title: Momentary turn off

virtual_power_usage.description: Virtual power usage in Watts (e.g. 9 or '9W' OR 9kW). Used for virtual energy meter.
virtual_power_usage.title: Virtual power usage

virtual_volume_flow_rate.description: Virtual volume flow rate in liters per hour (e.g. 9 or 9L/min OR 9L/h). Used for virtual flow meter.
virtual_volume_flow_rate.title: Virtual volume flow rate

interlock_group.description: Restore saved state of boneio. Not used for "none" and output_type!
interlock_group.title: Interlock group

percentage_default_brightness.description: When the brightness is not set in ha, and we switch led to turn this value will be used
percentage_default_brightness.title: Percentage default brightness

output_type.description: If HA discovery is used device if relay is light or switch. Cover if this output will be used for cover. If None is declared then any state is not published to MQTT (used for cover).
output_type.title: Output type

id.description: Id to send to use in HA and in GPIO Input. Default to `kind_pin`
id.title: Id

all_on_behaviour.description: Behaviour if set true toggle when all outputs are on, otherwise if any is on then group is on.
all_on_behaviour.title: All on behaviour

output_type.description: If HA discovery is used device if relay is light or switch.
output_type.title: Output type

output_group.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/output_group 
 List of groupes outputs to define. Output has to be defined first in output section!
output_group.title: Output group

id.description: Id to use in HA if needed. Default to pin number.
id.title: Id

gpio_mode.description: What mode to use in config PIN.
gpio_mode.title: Gpio mode

detection_type.description: There are 2 detector algorithms. Old consumes more CPU but it is tested by many users. New is more optimized, but needed extra time for testing.
detection_type.title: Detection type

clear_message.description: Decide if after press/release callback send empty message to mqtt. Same as Zigbee2Mqtt is doing in button actions.
clear_message.title: Clear message

bounce_time.description: Bounce time for GPIO in miliseconds. Only for advanced usage.
bounce_time.title: Bounce time

show_in_ha.description: If you want you can disable discovering this input in HA.
show_in_ha.title: Show in ha

inverted.description: Check if sensor type is inverted. Only aplicable for sensor kind.
inverted.title: Inverted

initial_send.description: If set to true, then on startup of application initial status of the binary sensor will be send to MQTT.
initial_send.title: Initial send

device_class.description: Device class to use in HA
device_class.title: Device class

topic.description: If mqtt action then topic to send
topic.title: Topic

action_cover.description: If cover action chosen then what action to perform.
action_cover.title: Action cover

tilt_position.description: Tilt position to set cover to. 0 means closed, 100 means opened.
tilt_position.title: Tilt position

data.description: Extra data to send to function. Currently used only for cover tilt.
data.title: Data

action_output.description: If output action chosen then what action to perform.
action_output.title: Action output

action_mqtt_msg.description: What message to send to mqtt topic
action_mqtt_msg.title: Action mqtt msg

boneio_id.description: boneIO id to perform action on. Use only with action type `output_over_mqtt` or `cover_over_mqtt`.
boneio_id.title: Boneio id

topic.description: If mqtt action then topic to send
topic.title: Topic

action_cover.description: If cover action chosen then what action to perform.
action_cover.title: Action cover

tilt_position.description: Tilt position to set cover to. 0 means closed, 100 means opened.
tilt_position.title: Tilt position

data.description: Extra data to send to function. Currently used only for cover tilt.
data.title: Data

action_output.description: If output action chosen then what action to perform.
action_output.title: Action output

action_mqtt_msg.title: Action mqtt msg

boneio_id.description: boneIO id to perform action on. Use only with action type `output_over_mqtt` or `cover_over_mqtt`.
boneio_id.title: Boneio id

binary_sensor.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/binary 
 GPIO binary section of boneIO Black. It enables binary sensors in HA. It detects press and release states. It can run action based on states. It always send message to MQTT broker of invoked state.
binary_sensor.title: Binary sensor

id.description: Id to use in HA if needed. Default to pin number.
id.title: Id

gpio_mode.description: What mode to use in config PIN.
gpio_mode.title: Gpio mode

detection_type.description: There are 2 detector algorithms. Old consumes more CPU but it is tested by many users. New is more optimized, but needed extra time for testing.
detection_type.title: Detection type

clear_message.description: Decide if after press/release callback send empty message to mqtt. Same as Zigbee2Mqtt is doing in button actions.
clear_message.title: Clear message

bounce_time.description: Bounce time for GPIO in miliseconds. Only for advanced usage.
bounce_time.title: Bounce time

show_in_ha.description: If you want you can disable discovering this input in HA.
show_in_ha.title: Show in ha

inverted.description: Check if sensor type is inverted. Only aplicable for sensor kind.
inverted.title: Inverted

device_class.title: Device class

topic.title: Topic

action_cover.title: Action cover

tilt_position.title: Tilt position

action_output.title: Action output

boneio_id.title: Boneio id

event.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/event 
 GPIO event entity section of boneIO Black. It enables event entities in HA. It detects single, double and long click. It can run action based on states. It always send message to MQTT broker of invoked state.
event.title: Event

id.description: Id to use in HA if needed. Default to pin number.
id.title: Id

update_interval.description: Update interval. How often to fetch data from sensor. Default to 60s.
update_interval.title: Update interval

show_in_ha.description: If you want you can disable discovering this input in HA.
show_in_ha.title: Show in ha

filters.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
filters.title: Filters

adc.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/adc 
 GPIO ADC section of boneIO Black. It enables ADC sensors in HA. Don't let them hang without use.
adc.title: Adc

id.description: Id to use in HA if needed.
id.title: Id

open_relay.description: ID of open relay of output.
open_relay.title: Open relay

close_relay.description: ID of close relay of output.
close_relay.title: Close relay

open_time.description: Time to open cover. Example 30s. Minimum is 1s.
open_time.title: Open time

close_time.description: Time to close cover. Example 30s. Minimum is 1s.
close_time.title: Close time

tilt_duration.description: Time to tilt cover. Example 2s. Minimum is 10ms.
tilt_duration.title: Tilt duration

actuator_activation_duration.description: Time to activate actuator cover. Example 30s. Minimum is 0ms.
actuator_activation_duration.title: Actuator activation duration

device_class.description: Device class to use in HA
device_class.title: Device class

show_in_ha.description: If you want you can disable discovering this input in HA.
show_in_ha.title: Show in ha

cover.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/cover 
 Cover section of boneIO Black. It enables cover entities in HA. You'd need output config to use it first.
cover.title: Cover

id.description: Id of I2C to use in pin config
id.title: Id

ds2482.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/ds2482 
 DS2482 section of boneIO Black. It enables DS2482 1 wire extenders, which you can use in sensor: config.
ds2482.title: Ds2482

id.description: Id of bus to use in sensor config.
id.title: Id

dallas.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/configuration/dallas 
 Dallas section of boneIO Black. It enables Dallas bus in boneIO Black Kernel.
dallas.title: Dallas

id.description: Id to use in HA if needed. Default to address.
id.title: Id

platform.description: Platform of sensor to use. Currently only Dallas platform is supported.
platform.title: Platform

bus_id.description: Put bus_id (either dallas or ds2482) defined id if you want to add DS18B20 connected via DS2482. Defaults to Dallas bus id.
bus_id.title: Bus id

show_in_ha.description: If you want you can disable discovering this input in HA.
show_in_ha.title: Show in ha

filters.description: List of filters to apply. Allowed filters visible in allowed section.
filters.title: Filters

update_interval.description: Update interval. How often to fetch data from sensor. Default to 60s.
update_interval.title: Update interval

sensor.description: Sensor list. Currently only Dallas DS18B20 and DS2482 support. Check DS18B20 or DS2482 section for more info.
sensor.title: Sensor

name.description: Name of boneio. Default is Black.
name.title: Name

boneio.description:
https://boneio.eu/docs/black/0.9.x-dev/configuration/boneio 
 BoneIO configuration section. It's new section for boneIO Black. It enables you to use predefined device types. For now only 0.7 and 0.8 devices are supported.
boneio.title: Boneio
